ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] bracer of the hidden
ygData.msgSnippet: handy on plane of sky trips. Other then that, not very imo. i guess i can understand where a mage would want one for their air pets. Then again, my main is a
ygData.messageBody:
handy on plane of sky trips. Other then that, not very imo. i guess i can
understand where a mage would want one for their air pets. Then again, my
main is a necro, if im in an open area, i always have Dead man floating on
which lasts over an hour of see invis effect. But damn, to pay 2k for a see
invis item is nuts. Congrats 8)

-Rakka
-Minkin
Sol Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: Bill Costlow [mailto:atlatyl@...]
Sent: Friday, June 30, 2000 6:37 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] bracer of the hidden


Won a lotto item from inside the Sarnak castle on the
Lake...

Bracer of the Hidden, AC 6, all, all
effect: see invisible

Rare drop off sarnak legos.

I was drowned in tells starting at 500 pp.
I sold it for 2K to a 54th lvl magician for the
"convenience" of being able to see his air pet.

Honestly I had no idea anyone would pay that much for
it...I would have been overjoyed with 200.

My question is this: Am I really goig to need this
THAT much at higher lvl?
